name: Congresswoman Deborah Ross
tweet_text: That is why I support the STEM Opportunities Act and the MSI STEM Achievement Act, to advance policies to address inequities in academic STEM careers and support critical initiatives to increase diversity in STEM.

tweet_text: Underrepresentation of women and people of color in #STEM weakens the industry and the economy. With diverse voices at the table, we can achieve greater inclusivity, innovation, equity, and prosperity.

name: Congresswoman Deborah Ross

tweet_text: As a co-sponsor of the Supporting Early-Career Researchers Act to establish a new fellowship program for young researchers, I was thrilled to vote yes to pass this bill. The Research Triangle Park is the largest research park in America and a hub of #STEM innovation and talent.

name: Congresswoman Deborah Ross
tweet_text: Tackling our nation’s most pressing challenges requires embracing the potential of all young people interested in #STEM. I stand w/ my colleagues on @HouseScience who put forth critical legislation to provide equitable access to STEM education opportunities & STEM workforce.
